title: is it true youz are giving jinx and her mafia ski out for free??
body: i got this link from my mate saying youz were giving mafia jinx to everyone for everyone for worlds?

replies.body: Scam. Never trust third party links.
except when ive gotten mad scientist ziggs and riot girl tristana from riot-most-likely-endorsed promotions lol. @scams
This is not true. It is a scam that results in losing your access to your account. If you do fall for it Riot has requested you submit a support ticket.
